description: Decades ago, tailors would learn their craft by sewing together shirts made from fabric remnants. Over time, a staple of playful preppy style evolved from the practice—the fun shirt. This version combines a utilitarian-inspired silhouette with four signature pastels and a striped collar to create a single statement-making oxford.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 34" back body length, a 22" shoulder, a 61¼" chest, and a 37" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 36" back body length, a 22½" shoulder, a 61¼" chest, and a 39" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Point collar. Buttoned throat tab. Buttoned placket.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
